pkgmetadata.longdescription: ========= whereto=========Test Apache redirect rules.whereto is an app for testing redirect rules like what may appear in a.htaccess file for Apache. It provides a way to test those rules in CIjobs.* Free software: Apache license* Documentation: http://whereto.readthedocs.io/en/latest/* Source: http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/whereto* Bugs: http://bugs.launchpad.net/whereto
